title: Unemployment rate in the Bahamas 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unemployment rate, containing a total of 21 data points.
In general Unemployment rate has rose over the Year.
The line significantly increased by 6.07 from Year 2008 to 2009.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Unemployment rate, of value 16.18 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Unemployment rate about 6.87 was reached at Year 2001
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unemployment rate, containing a total of 21 data points.
Overall Unemployment rate has increased over the Year.
mid_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unemployment rate, containing a total of 21 data points.
In general Unemployment rate has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Unemployment rate, of value 16.18 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Unemployment rate about 6.87 was reached at Year 2001
max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unemployment rate, containing a total of 21 data points.
Overall Unemployment rate has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Unemployment rate, of value 16.18 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Unemployment rate about 6.87 was reached at Year 2001
The line rapidly increased by 74.21% from Year 2008 to 2009.
